markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impossible Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=540) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Open" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=123" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 177 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.

</column>

---

You forgo precision to attack at an impossible speed. Make three melee Strikes with each of the required weapons. All of these Strikes take the maximum multiple attack penalty, as if you had already made two or more attacks this turn.

<title level="2">Impossible Flurry leads to...</title>
[Accurate Flurry](/Feats.aspx?ID=1778)
name: Impossible Flurry
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.
requirement_markdown: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand.
